name: part_001
file: tmp_【#マリン船長の番組】2周年記念に地獄企画いくつかやりました【ホロライブ⧸宝鐘マリン】 [tV0vI7Aflho]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_001.mov

scenes.description: An office drama skit where Marine (the subordinate) is confronting Miko (the manager) about a drinking party.
A classroom scene parodying shojo manga tropes, featuring Minato Aqua as a popular high school girl.
A cool 'binanshi' (beautiful boy) character played by Murasaki Shion enters the classroom to reject a confession.

subtitles.original: いやんっ
subtitles.english: Nooo!

subtitles.original: 部長のエッチ〜！
subtitles.english: Manager, you pervert!

subtitles.original: もう 何考えてるんですかっ
subtitles.english: Seriously, what are you thinking?

subtitles.original: ヘンタイ！
subtitles.english: Pervert!

subtitles.original: はぁわからせられる！
subtitles.english: Ha, I'm being taught a lesson!

subtitles.original: マリンまたわからせられちゃう〜！！
subtitles.english: Marine is being taught a lesson again~!!

subtitles.original: マリンたんとは行かないんだけどね
subtitles.english: But I'm not going with you, Marine-tan.

subtitles.original: なんで？
subtitles.english: Why?

subtitles.original: 今日はこのあと あの 他の部署との飲み会があってねぇ
subtitles.english:
After this, well, I have a drinking session
with another department.

subtitles.original: へぇ〜！そうなんですね！
subtitles.english: Oh! Is that so!

subtitles.original: マリンは聞いてないですけど なんでですか？
subtitles.english: Marine hasn't heard about this, but why?

subtitles.original: あ、あの あの あれだよ みんながあのほら…
subtitles.english: Ah, well, you see... it's not like everyone...

subtitles.original: 行くわけじゃなくて 数人で行くやつだから… あのね
subtitles.english: ...is going. It's just a few people going together.

subtitles.original: なるほどぉ〜
subtitles.english: I see~

subtitles.original: 付き合いみたいなぁ
subtitles.english: Like a social gathering.

subtitles.original: じゃあマリンも行っていいですよね？
subtitles.english: Then it's okay for Marine to go too, right?

subtitles.original: ダメだにぇ
subtitles.english: No way.

subtitles.original: なんで？
subtitles.english: Why?

subtitles.original: あの あれなんだよ 男の… 男がいっぱいいるからね
subtitles.english: Well, you see... there are many men there.

subtitles.original: むさ苦しい所に マリンたんが… ねぇ 女の子で みんな興奮しちゃうからね
subtitles.english:
In such a stuffy place, Marine-tan...
as a girl, everyone will get excited.

subtitles.original: はっ！
subtitles.english: Ha!

subtitles.original: たしかに マリン狙われちゃう！！！
subtitles.english: True, Marine will be targeted!!!

subtitles.original: 暑苦しい男の人たちに囲まれて… 飲み会の主役になっちゃう…！！
subtitles.english:
Surrounded by stuffy men...
I'll become the star of the drinking session...!!

subtitles.original: じゃあ行きますか
subtitles.english: Well then, shall we go?

subtitles.original: 絶対ダメだにぇ ここ… 今回は 今回はね
subtitles.english: Absolutely not. This... this time, this time, okay?

subtitles.original: 女か？
subtitles.english: Is it a woman?

subtitles.original: 先月隣の部署に来た あの若い女か？
subtitles.english:
Is it that young woman who joined
the next department last month?

subtitles.original: ピチピチのぉ
subtitles.english: A youthful one?

subtitles.original: いや ちがうねぇえ〜！！ 仕事のミーティングも兼ねてるから
subtitles.english: No, you're wrong!! It's also for a work meeting.

subtitles.original: 他の人が来ると 困るんだよね！！ 本当にやめてもらっていいかな
subtitles.english:
So it would be a problem if other people came!!
Could you please stop?

subtitles.original: なんだぁ そういうことですかぁ〜！
subtitles.english: Oh, so that's how it is~!

subtitles.original: じゃあ あの若い女はいないんですね？？
subtitles.english: Then that young woman won't be there, right??

subtitles.original: まあ そういうことだからね 今日は無理なんでぇ
subtitles.english: Well, that's why, it's impossible today.

subtitles.original: ごめんねぇマリンちゃん 本当に。 君ももうそろそろ帰りなさい 娘さんもいるしね
subtitles.english:
Sorry, Marine-chan, really. You should go home
soon too, since you have a daughter.

subtitles.original: それじゃあ！
subtitles.english: Well then!

subtitles.original: やだぁ！部長！！
subtitles.english: No way! Manager!!

subtitles.original: 若い女に乗り換えないで！！
subtitles.english: Don't switch to a young woman!!

subtitles.original: ちょっと… 離しなさい！
subtitles.english: Wait... let go!

subtitles.original: いったい
subtitles.english: Ouch

subtitles.original: いつになったら結婚してくれるのぉ！？
subtitles.english: When will you marry me!?

subtitles.original: ちょっとやめなさい君！
subtitles.english: Wait, stop that!

subtitles.original: 待ってるのにい！！
subtitles.english: I've been waiting!!

subtitles.original: ここは会社なんだから！！ 一応会社なんだよ君 ここ！！
subtitles.english:
This is an office!!
It's technically an office, you!!

subtitles.original: ひどい…
subtitles.english: How cruel...

subtitles.original: こんなにピチピチで 可愛くてエッチな女の子が待ってるのに
subtitles.english:
Even though such a youthful, cute,
and sexy girl is waiting

subtitles.original: この気持ちに応えてくれないなんて
subtitles.english: for you to not respond to these feelings...

subtitles.original: ピチピチではないにぇ
subtitles.english: You're not youthful.

subtitles.original: 結婚しろよぉぉ！！
subtitles.english: Marry me!!

subtitles.original: お、落ち着きたまえマリンちゃん！
subtitles.english: C-Calm down, Marine-chan!

subtitles.original: じゃあ明日結婚する？
subtitles.english: Then, shall we marry tomorrow?

subtitles.original: う〜ん まぁそれは早すぎるかな
subtitles.english: Hmm, well, that's probably too soon.

subtitles.original: じゃあいつ結婚してくれるの？？
subtitles.english: Then when will you marry me??

subtitles.original: まぁ あのぉ 色々手続きとかね あの 親への報告とかね…
subtitles.english:
Well, you know... there are various procedures,
informing the parents...

subtitles.original: なんやかんや そういうのがあるから 君ももうね 娘さんもいるしね
subtitles.english:
...all sorts of things like that, and you
already have a daughter too.

subtitles.original: そうなんだぁ…
subtitles.english: I see...

subtitles.original: あっ！じゃあマリンが先に部長のご両親にご挨拶に伺いましょっか！
subtitles.english:
Ah! Then should Marine go and greet
the manager's parents first!

subtitles.original: やめて欲しいにぇ！！
subtitles.english: I want you to stop!!

subtitles.original: ごめんねぇマリンちゃん 君のこと 可愛くて エッチだとは思ってるけどー
subtitles.english:
Sorry, Marine-chan. I think you're cute
and sexy, but—

subtitles.original: えぇっ// ピチピチで可愛くてエッチだなんて そんなぁ〜//
subtitles.english:
Eh// Youthful, cute, and sexy?
Oh, stop it~//

subtitles.original: ピチピチではないにぇ
subtitles.english: You're not youthful.

subtitles.original: 可愛くてエッチだとはおもってるけど…
subtitles.english: I think you're cute and sexy, but...

subtitles.original: それ以上の感情はないにぇぇ！！
subtitles.english: I have no feelings beyond that!!

subtitles.original: 正直もうキツいにぇぇぇ！！
subtitles.english: Honestly, it's already getting tough!!

subtitles.original: どるるるぅぅぅああああ！！
subtitles.english: Dorururuuuuaaaa!!

subtitles.original: いたいけなマリンを騙しやがってよね！！
subtitles.english: You deceived the innocent Marine, didn't you!!

subtitles.original: 許すまじっ
subtitles.english: Unforgivable

subtitles.original: ぜってぇ許すまじぃぃッ！！
subtitles.english: I'll never forgive you!!

subtitles.original: 待てコラァァァァ！！！！
subtitles.english: Wait, hey!!!!

subtitles.original: （むせび泣く音）
subtitles.english: (Sobbing sounds)

subtitles.original: ひどいっ
subtitles.english: So cruel

subtitles.original: なんでみんなマリンを裏切りるの…
subtitles.english: Why does everyone betray Marine...

subtitles.original: マリンちゃん こんなに尽くしてるのに…
subtitles.english: Even though Marine-chan is being so devoted...

subtitles.original: これは… みこ部長の研究してる よくわからない薬… こんなものぉ！！
subtitles.english:
This is... that mysterious medicine Manager Miko
is researching... Something like this!!

subtitles.original: あくあは… 娘のあくあは あんなに言い寄られるのに…
subtitles.english:
Aqua... even though my daughter Aqua
is being approached like that...

subtitles.original: マリンの方がぜったいエッチなのに…
subtitles.english: Even though Marine is definitely sexier...

subtitles.original: どうしてっ…！
subtitles.english: Why...!

subtitles.original: あてぃし 恋愛とかまだ分からなくて… だからごめんなさい…！
subtitles.english:
I don't really understand love yet...
so I'm sorry...!

subtitles.original: はぁ… 今日だけでもう45人目
subtitles.english: Sigh... that's the 45th person just today.

subtitles.original: いい加減 断るのも疲れちゃったなぁ
subtitles.english: I'm getting tired of rejecting people.

subtitles.original: あてぃし あくあ！ どこにでもいる平凡な女子高生！
subtitles.english: I'm Aqua! Just your ordinary high school girl!

subtitles.original: —のはずなんだけど… 毎日二ケタの男子から告白されちゃってもう大変！
subtitles.english:
—or at least I'm supposed to be... but it's tough
being confessed to by dozens of boys every day!

subtitles.original: 昨日なんか通りすがりの石油王にまで告白されて もうびっくりしちゃった！
subtitles.english:
Yesterday, I was even confessed to by a passing
oil tycoon, I was so surprised!

subtitles.original: ただ普通に高校生活を送りたいだけなのに どうしていつもこうなっちゃうのぉ？？
subtitles.english:
I just want to have a normal high school life,
so why does this always happen??

subtitles.original: ほかにカワイイ女の子なんかいっぱいいるのに みんなどうしてあたしなんだろう…
subtitles.english:
There are plenty of other cute girls,
so why is everyone after me...

subtitles.original: 困っちゃうなぁ
subtitles.english: It's so troubling.

subtitles.original: でもいつか ママが読んでくれた絵本に出てくる王子様みたいな…
subtitles.english:
But one day, like a prince from the picture books
my mom read to me...

subtitles.original: 下を向いて10回クルクル回ったあとに
subtitles.english:
A prince who can spin around 10 times
looking down...

subtitles.original: すぐ片足立ちをしてもよろけずに
subtitles.english:
...then immediately stand on one leg
without wobbling...

subtitles.original: 愛を叫ぶことができる王子様
subtitles.english: ...and shout his love.

subtitles.original: みたいな人が現れたら… あたしも恋に落ちるんだろうなぁ…
subtitles.english:
If someone like that appears...
I'm sure I'll fall in love too...

subtitles.original: 誰かいるわっ
subtitles.english: Someone's there.

subtitles.original: おい勘弁してくれよ
subtitles.english: Hey, give me a break.

subtitles.original: オマエみたいな女 この俺サマにふさわしいわけないだろ？
subtitles.english:
A girl like you couldn't possibly be worthy
of me, could she?

subtitles.original: まぁ その程度のスペックで 俺サマに愛を告げた蛮勇だけは認めてやるよ
subtitles.english:
Well, I'll at least acknowledge the reckless courage
you had to confess your love to me with those specs.

subtitles.original: 俺とアベックになりたいなら わずかな期待を抱いて来世にでも賭けるんだな
subtitles.english:
If you want to be a couple with me, hold on to
a slim hope and bet on your next life.

subtitles.original: アディオス
subtitles.english: Adios.

subtitles.original: おいそこに隠れてる女！
subtitles.english: Hey, you woman hiding there!
